user_question: What are the top 5 most luxurious train journeys in the world and generate an image of the most luxurious one?
final_answer: The top 5 most luxurious train journeys are: 1) The Venice Simplon-Orient-Express, Europe. 2) The Maharajas' Express, India. 3) The Royal Scotsman, Scotland. 4) The Blue Train, South Africa. 5) The Rocky Mountaineer, Canada. Image of the Venice Simplon-Orient-Express generated. It offers luxurious cabins, fine dining with gourmet meals, a bar car with live piano music, and personalized service.
